rules.name: Mon_Tues_Wed_Thur
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Mon / Tues / Wed / Thur

rules.name: Wed_Thur_Fri_Sat
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Wed / Thur / Fri / Sat

rules.name: Tue_Wed_Thur_Fri_Sat_Sun
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
rules.label: Tue / Wed / Thur / Fri / Sat / Sun

start.filterLogic: (1 OR 2) AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10
